definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Direct the DSAS's microphone towards the source of sound.
sentences.chinese: 指令員的麥克風對源頭的聲音。

sentences.english: When you are recording video, it will use the secondary mic for the sound.
sentences.chinese: 當你在錄製視頻時，他會使用第二個麥克風錄音。

sentences.english: Those who specialize in simultaneous interpretations do so with the use of an ear piece and a microphone.
sentences.chinese: 同聲傳譯人員使用耳機和麥克風來實現傳譯。

sentences.english: ” the speaker asked, handing the microphone to a five-year-old boy.
sentences.chinese: 主持者問道，把麥克風遞給一個五歲大的小男孩。

sentences.english: Nobody expects Dolly Parton to know how to plug in a microphone.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人期望桃莉巴頓知道如何接上麥克風。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, a microphone, which was lowered into the mine two hours ago.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，兩個小時以前放下井去的一隻麥克風。

sentences.english: Somehow I still gripped my wireless microphone with both hands.
sentences.chinese: 不知爲什麼，我的雙手仍握着無線麥克風。

sentences.english: Superior sound performance with two noise-canceling mics .
sentences.chinese: 出衆的聲音表現有兩個降噪麥克風。

sentences.english: We got an acoustic guitar and a mic on stage.
sentences.chinese: 我們在舞臺上準備一把木吉他和麥克風。
內置式網絡攝像頭和麥克風。

sentences.english: If you’re doing recording, invest in a good mic or headset.
sentences.chinese: 如果你從事唱片工作，請購買上好的麥克風和耳機。

sentences.english: Is the mic on? Oh. This is fine.
sentences.chinese: 麥克風開了嗎，好，這樣可以。

sentences.english: A bundle of microphones listens for a bullet or RPG.
sentences.chinese: 一束麥克風用於監聽子彈或榴彈發射器。

sentences.english: High-sensitivity internal mic for tuning acoustic guitars.
sentences.chinese: 高靈敏度麥克風的內部調整聲學吉他。

sentences.english: Sidewalk vendors use banks of speakers to pour out reggae music at an ear-thumping volume.
sentences.chinese: 街邊小販用一排麥克風傾泄震耳欲聾的瑞格舞音樂。

sentences.english: There was Walter Cronkite in shirtsleeves, with a microphone in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾特克朗凱特在襯衫，在他面前的麥克風。

definition: ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
to aim at/to target/to point at/to be directed at/registration/alignment (mechanical engineering)
power switch/gas valve/to open the city (or frontier) gate/to open and close/to switch on and off
to be a real headache/to find sth a real headache/to beat one's brains
to eject/to exit from/to pop up
